bioghist.p: Founded in 1792, the Insurance Company of North America was the country's first marine insurer. In 1794 the company sold its first life insurance policy. In 1982, Connecticut General Life Insurance Company and the Insurance Company of North America merged to form CIGNA.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of city insurance licenses from various towns in Alabama and Georgia. The collection also includes two volumes of evidence for claims on ships underwritten, 1790-1831. These volumes appear to have been copied over at a later date, possibly in the late nineteenth century.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
